application_type_full: Tree works: Trees in conservation areas/subject to TPOs
description: Front: T2-Crab apple: Remove crossing and dead branches.Rear (main garden): T1- Elder: Reduce back to previous reduction points. T2-Laurel: crown reduce to previous most recent reduction points. T4-Lime: lift to 2.5-3m, remove dead, damaged and crossing branches (fine twiggy branches only). T5-Pear: Reduce to previous, most recent reduction points retaining furnishing growth. T6-Birch: Reduce back to previous reduction points, retaining furnishing growth. T7- Lime (x2):  Reduce back to previous reduction points. T8-Cotoneaster: Reduce back to previous reduction points. T10-Cherry: Remove, dead damaged and crossing branches (twiggy growth only) T11-Plane: Remove, dead damaged and crossing branches (twiggy growth only). T12- Pear: Remove, dead damaged and crossing branches (twiggy growth only). T13-Turkey oak: Clean out crown, remove dead, damaged and crossing branches (fine twiggy branches only).
